text: The reality TV personality is expecting baby No. 1 with her boyfriend, Grayston Leonard. Another baby is joining Bachelor Nation. Bekah Martinez, who competed for Arie Luyendyk Jr.'s heart on season 22 of The Bachelor, revealed Wednesday that she is pregnant and expecting her first child with her boyfriend, Grayston Leonard. Martinez shared the news in an interview with PureWow. ` ` I was in disbelief and thought,'Is this really happening?'''Martinez told the site. ` ` I immediately called Grayston and then went across the street to the Dollar Tree and bought two more pregnancy tests. They, of course, were both positive.'' According to Martinez, who has been dating Leonard for seven months, becoming a mother is ` ` legitimately a dream come true.''
